check_var_is_function(attribute, attribute_name)[source]ÔÉÅ

Check if the modification is a function.

Parameters:

  • attribute (object) ‚Äì Attribute to check.

  • attribute_name (str) ‚Äì Name of the attribute to check (for the error message)

Raises:

TypeError ‚Äì If the modification is not a function.
